arts.sum: Nottingham Forest travel to Anfield on Saturday looking to heap more misery on a struggling Liverpool side. Sean Dyche’s men arrive at Anfield with renewed confidence today. This follows a vital 3-1 win over Leeds United in their last outing. arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Liverpool return to Premier League action on Saturday, facing a deepening crisis as they host a revitalised Nottingham Forest at Anfield. The reigning champions entered the international break at a low ebb, having lost five of their last six league games.
